name: Axis
headline: Knowledge base for corporate affairs teams
description: Axis is a knowledge base of government regulations and officials that helps large companies do business in foreign markets. For example, if you want to operate in Saudi Arabia - our software tells you which laws you need to comply with and which officials you need approvals from. We currently cover major markets in Europe, Middle East, and Africa

founders.name: Mishaal Al Gergawi, Founder
founders.description: I grew up in Dubai and was there most of my life till moving to New York in 2018. I studied finance and worked in investment banking. I became a writer in 2008 and in 2011 built Delma, a risk consultancy.

generated_description:
**Axis: Navigating Corporate Affairs with Precision**

Axis is not your run-of-the-mill knowledge base; it’s a targeted toolkit for corporate affairs teams that helps large companies comply with government regulations and navigate the complexities of international markets. Launched in 2018 and a proud member of Y Combinator's W22 cohort, Axis stands out as a beacon for any enterprise looking to expand its footprint in foreign territories—whether that’s understanding the regulations in Saudi Arabia or plotting a compliant strategy in Europe, the Middle East, or Africa.

At its core, Axis is designed to provide clarity amidst the chaos of international regulations. They offer a robust software solution that packages essential information about legal compliance, necessary approvals, and key officials, making it easier for companies to operate globally. With coverage extending across more than 200 industries and 40 countries, Axis equips businesses with the insights they need to effectively understand and engage with diverse markets.

The company is headquartered in New York and boasts a nimble team of 15 dedicated employees. Under the guidance of Group Partner Brad Flora, Axis is poised for growth and innovation, consistently evolving its offerings to meet the needs of its users. They're tapping into cutting-edge technologies like machine learning to streamline their services and provide even more tailored solutions.

If you're curious about how Axis can help your business decode the complexities of global operations, they offer demos and additional resources on their [website](http://axis.xyz).

In a world where rules and regulations are ever-changing and often baffling, Axis positions itself as the indispensable ally for corporate teams, helping them turn compliance into a competitive advantage.
